traits.name: Avoidance
entries: If the null is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take half as much damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and half as much damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The null makes two Force Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Force Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) force damage. Hit or Miss: The dagger magically returns to the null's hand immediately after a ranged attack.
